translations: 手足，四肢；尽头，末端；极端，绝境；残酷的手段，非常手段

phrs.translation: 极大的危险(或不幸消息)

sentences.sentence: In spite of the extremity of her seclusion she was sane.
sentences.translation: 尽管完全与世隔绝，她依然神智清醒。

sentences.sentence: The lake is situated at the eastern extremity of the mountain range.
In her extremity, an instinct told her to which of them to turn.
sentences.translation: 在她陷入困境时，一种直觉告诉她该向他们中的哪一个求助。
